MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 05-DEC-2020 22:52.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL31 postcode area of Llandudno Junction, affecting properties in Conway Road, Stanley Oak Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at  7:52PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:40PM on Saturday 5th December 2020
